siteMetadata.title: Custom Elements
siteMetadata.description: Samples of the HTML web pages that can be used as Custom Elements in Kentico Kontent. Custom elements help you with extending the basic functionality of Kentico Kontent UI and thus improving the content editing experience. Custom element is essentially a small HTML application that exists in a sandboxed <iframe> and interacts with the Kentico Kontent app via the Custom Elements API.

node.title: Ace Code Editor (Syntax Highlighter)
node.description: This custom element is an editable text area enhanced by the Ace Code Editor to provide a programmer-friendly environment for writing code examples. Offers a fine selection of programming languages to be highlighted.

node.title: Bing Image Selector
node.description: The Bing image selector allows to search images on Bing and select one. Note: selected image may be subject to copyright and/or usage restrictions

node.title: Bynder Image Selector
node.description: The Bynder Image Selector allows to search images in Bynder DAM and use them in your website.

node.title: Color Picker
node.description: Color picker allowing user to choose a color from palette and sets it as a HEX string, e.g. '#ff0000' for red color, '#00ff00' for green, and so on.

node.title: Country State Selector
node.description: Country and state selector is a drop down selector which allows users to select country and state (if country has any).

node.title: Date Picker
node.description: This is a simple calendar control based on jQuery UI DatePicker which lets you pick a date.

node.title: Flickr Image Selector
node.description: The Flickr image selector allows you to search images on Flickr and select one. NOTE: Selected image may be subject to copyright and/or usage restrictions.

node.title: Geolocation Leaflet
node.description: This custom element allows you to put a marker on a map and it automatically gets converted to latitude and longitude geo locations.

node.title: Giphy Selector
node.description: The Giphy Selector allows you to search images on Giphy and select one.

node.title: Google Places Geo-location Selector
node.description: This is a custom element for Kentico Kontent that allows users to easily get the geo-coordinates for a location using the Google Places API.

node.title: HTML Inputs
node.description: This is a custom element for Kentico Kontent that allows you to define a group of HTML inputs that your editors can fill out one or more times. You can combine any number of HTML5 inputs into a single element -> text, textarea, color, date, time, number, radio, checkbox, password and range.

node.title: Image transformer
node.description: This custom element functions similarly to the Asset element, but allows an editor to apply the Image Transformation API to any selected image.

node.title: Ipsum Input
node.description: The ipsum input allows you to quickly add ipsum content to your input fields.

node.title: Item selector
node.description: This element offers items from another project to be linked with your item

node.title: Magento Product Selector
node.description: Magento product selector is a selector connected to Magento instance which allows users to search and select a product from the Magento product catalog.

node.title: Optimizely Audience Selector
node.description: Optimizely audiences selector is a selector connected to Optimizely API which allows users to search and select audiences from the Optimizely.

node.title: Quill Rich Text Editor
node.description: This custom element is based on the Quill rich text editor. It stores content in JSON format, so it's omni-channel friendly.

node.title: SVG Icon Selector
node.description: This is a custom element for Kentico Kontent that allows users to select an SVG icon from a list of provided icons.

node.title: Shopify Product Selector
node.description: Shopify product selector is a selector connected to Shopify Storefront which allows users to search and select a product from Shopify product catalog.

node.title: SimpleMDE (Markdown Editor)
node.description: SimpleMDE is a markdown editor which allows users to write formatted text. In this sample element, you can find examples of setting dynamic height and reacting on the window ‘resize’ events. When the element is disabled, the editor is set to the read-only mode.

node.title: Summernote Rich Text Editor
node.description: This custom element is based on the Summernote rich text editor. It allows you to switch to the Source code mode to edit or see the HTML markup!

node.title: TinyMCE Rich Text Editor
node.description: This custom element is based on the TinyMCE WYSIWYG text editor.

node.title: Toast UI Editor
node.description: This cusotm element is based on Toast UI Editor. It is a Markdown WYSIWYG Editor including GFM Standard + Chart & UML Extensible.

node.title: Toggle Switch
node.description: This custom element is just a simple on/off toggle switch.

node.title: Unique Textbox
node.description: This custom element checks whether your entered value is unique across all items in your project in specified element.

node.title: Unsplash Images Selector
node.description: This is a custom element for Kentico Kontent that allows users to search and select high-quality, royalty-free images from Unsplash.

node.title: Video Preview
node.description: This custom element allows allows users to display preview of a video configured in other elements. This custom element is built specifically for the Hosted video content type in Kentico Kontent DancingGoat sample site.

node.title: YouTube Preview
node.description: This custom element allows you to add various types of Youtube video URL, it extracts the video id for your apps and shows the video.

node.title: YouTube Selector
node.description: YouTube selector allows users to search and select videos from YouTube.
